entry.title: A Lilac Love
entry.summary:
Author: TheBobblehat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 75,628Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 311

Summary: Sequel to LAVENDER MARRIAGEIt's been three months since Clark was shot with a bullet of lavender kryptonite, impressing him with false memories of his marriage to Bruce Wayne. After a tumultuous balancing act between truth, lies, and certain death, Clark is finally free of the kryptonite's influence, but not its after effects. In the aftermath, Clark confessed his true feelings for Bruce, who eventually let his walls down long enough to give dating a shot.Now in the midst of a brand new(ish) relationship, they aim to keep it business as usual for Batman and Superman. But the League is getting suspicious, and when an old face returns under strange circumstances, their delicate relationship may not be able to weather the storm.

entry.title: The Way You Bruise
entry.summary:
Author: AllandBeyond

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,224Chapters: 9/30Kudos: 53

Summary: Clark Kent is convinced Bruce Wayne is nothing more than a spoiled rich kid, while Bruce is certain Clark is an irritating journalist who cannot mind his own business. They tell themselves they hate each other, but a single reckless kiss at a party leaves them tangled in something far more complicated. Now every fight feels like a challenge, every bruise feels like a reminder, and neither of them is ready to admit that hate might not be the only thing keeping them up at night.

entry.title: Operation: Superbat
entry.summary:
Author: cavesongs

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,658Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 62

Summary: âMight I remind everyone,â Dick began, pacing with his hands clasped behind his back like a military general about to unveil battle plans, âthat the secrecy of this operation is of utmost importance?â He stopped in front of a rolling board draped with a tattered sheet. âGet on with it, dickface. I donât have all night.â Jasonâs voice rasped through the modulator in his helmetâ low, metallic, and stripped of warmth, like gravel fed through a busted speaker. A couple of the others muttered their agreement. âFine, fine.â Dick tugged off the covering with a gloved hand and a flourish. Bold letters shouted back at them: OPERATION: SUPERBAT, with a crudely drawn House of El crest jammed into a bat symbol beneath. Â  ------------------------------------------ Â  A few months after Clark and Lois divorce, Dick, Jason, Conner, Tim, Damian, and Jon form a plan to lift Superman's spirits and bring Batman's near two decades of pining to an end. Operation: Superbat begins with the boys stranding their parents in a red sun planet, where they're forced to take a two week vacationâno distractionsâ and face their feelings for each other once and for all.

He sighed, adjusting his glasses as he raised his recorder. âUhâ¦ âFemmeâ¦ etâ¦ uh, boy sons?â He attempted, for his own clarification, later. âPortrays a witch womanâ¦wailing over a broken trombone.â He whinged, tapping his recorder against his chin with an added âReal hard-hitting journalism, Clark,â Before disheartenedly shutting it off. Heâd long tuned out the hushed whispers and illicit business affairs the groups had divided into, due to the unethical source of information and primarily to maintain his own willful ignorance.Â  Which is how he mustâve missed the approach of the man behind him. âThatâs a bit harsh, no?â

entry.title: The Sun Cares
entry.summary:
Author: GeraldSillu

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,453Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 48

Summary: "In any other circumstance what you're doing now would be... reasonable. But this is based off a hunch. Do you have proof that the Riddler and the penguin are actually planning something together?" Bruce was glaring at him again. He grated his teeth together in contemplation. "I don't have solid proof, but I know-" Superman held up a hand, pausing Bruce mid-sentence. "No, you don't know. You don't know if they have anything planned at all. But what I do know," Clark moved closer to Bruce, step by step. "Is that you have to go to sleep." He loomed over Bruce. "And I'm not asking anymore." or Bruce won't go to sleep, so Clark has to step in
